Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher feedback I respond to better as there’s a person to converse with. However sometimes it is embarrassing to approach a teacher or asking them for feedback doesn’t fit well with their schedule, so I resort to using AI

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI feedback does not impact me as much as feedback from a teacher as a teacher understands my way of writing and what the task consists of
